subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Greg Micheli threw for two touchdowns and Nate Kmic ran for one as Mount Union regained its spot atop Division III football with a 31-26 victory over the defending champion Wisconsin-Whitewater in the Stagg Bowl at Salem, Va.
snippet: Greg Micheli threw for two touchdowns and Nate Kmic ran for one as Mount Union regained its spot atop Division III football with a 31-26 victory over the defending champion Wisconsin-Whitewater in the Stagg Bowl at Salem, Va.
